A Family of Integrated Companies

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(30,74,117,0.65) 0%|rgba(30,74,117,0.65) 100%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(30,74,117,0.65)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(30,74,117,0.65)” background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/partners-2.jpg” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code admin_label=”Empty Spacer” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Text Centered – with Flag” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#F0F0F0″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Flag Row” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/hero-flag.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”75px||75px||true|false” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”25px” header_2_line_height=”1.28em” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”780px” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A Family of Integrated Companies

When service is at the center of a business, ongoing support is essential. Businesses can’t do it all on their own, so we’ve assembled the solutions to your needs all in one place under our umbrella of companies.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Partners Grid” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”Row 1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” border_color_right=”#F0F0F0″ border_color_bottom=”#F0F0F0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/j3partnerV2.png” alt=”BlackStone” title_text=”j3partnerV2″ align=”center” admin_label=”Image” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”25px” header_2_line_height=”1.28em” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”780px” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dedicated to helping the funeral and cemetery services business

evolve through technology while maintaining a personal connection.

Innovating the profession by updating web design and utilizing

service software solutions such as Performance Tracker X, Sharebly, and TheGigScout.

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://www.j3techsolutions.com/” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#cc7022″ button_border_width=”0px” button_font=”Bitter||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” border_color_bottom=”#F0F0F0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/FRM-Logo.pngSMALL3.png” alt=”FRM Logo” title_text=”FRM-Logo.png(SMALL)3″ align=”center” admin_label=”Image” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.4″ text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”25px” header_2_line_height=”1.28em” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”780px” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

 

The first digital marketing agency dedicated to the funeral

and cemetery services profession. Specializing in online

marketing strategies, website hosting, design and development,

SEO strategy and implementation, Google Ads, pay-per-click,

and online reputation management.

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://hubs.ly/Q01JBsm30″ url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ custom_button=”on” Let’s start the conversation

With a clear understanding of where the profession has been, and a compelling vision of where it’s going, we help our clients reach new levels of success. Let’s talk about how we can do the same for you.
